dedicated_clouds_onboarding_description: We've designed a platform similar to your on-prem experience, including vSphere, vCenter and vROps.
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_description2: With an OVHcloud private cloud infrastructure, you get a cloud service, our ability to innovate, and reduce your costs and environmental impact.
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_description3: We manage the maintenance of your hardware and software infrastructure.
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_guide1_title: Introduction to the OVHcloud Control Panel
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_guide1_descr: Explore the possibilities in the VMware Control Panel
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_guide2_descr: Discover the Tanzu Kubernetes Grid solution and its integration capabilities in VMware on OVHcloud
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_guide3_title: Configure an IP address on a virtual machine
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_guide3_descr: After you create a virtual machine, you can assign it a public or private IP address
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_us_guide1_ti: How to Access the NSX Interface
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_us_guide1_de: NSX is a Software-Defined Network (SDN) solution developed by VMware that is activated from the vCenter and managed directly from the vSphere interface. With NSX, you can configure rules to access your networks, create your security policy, and quickly deploy the various network services needed to build your infrastructure. This article provides an introduction to the NSX interface.
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_us_guide2_ti: How to Modify the vCenter Access Policy
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_us_guide2_de: To enhance security for your Managed Bare Metal infrastructure, you can restrict and manage the access to vCenter. In this article, we will go over how to change the access policy for vCenter in the OVHcloud Manager.
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_us_guide3_ti: How to Authorise IP Addresses for vCenter Access
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_us_guide3_de: Access to your vCenter environment can be restricted by allowing only certain IP addresses or ranges to connect to it. In this article, we will cover how to authorise IP addresses for vCenter access in the OVHcloud Manager.
dedicated_clouds_onboarding_description4: You also get high-performance cloud services, with options like NSX, vSAN, and Veeam Backup (for your backups) ------ and Zerto (for your disaster recovery plan).
